<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Giant Centipede Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3334)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=635" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 292 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 249 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Giant centipede venom causes severe muscle stiffness and general fatigue. 

**Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d4 poison damage and [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73) (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d4 poison damage, clumsy 1, and fatigued (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Giant Centipede Venom
